#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	unsigned long n;
	string s;
	int i,l,ans;
	while(1)
	{
	//get the number
	cin>>s;
	i=0;
	while(s[i]!='e')
	{
		i++;
	}
	s[i]='\0';
	n=atoi(&s[0]);
	if(n==0)
		break;
	int zero=0;
	//get the number of zeroes
	zero=atoi(&s[i+1]);
	
	n=n*pow(10,zero);
	
	l= floor(log(n)/log(2.0));
	
	ans=n-pow(2,l);
	ans*=2;
	cout<<ans+1;
	cout<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
